body:
Here is ours, currently in press:

A. I. Ruppertsberg and M. Bloj, 2006, Rendering complex scenes for psychophysics
using RADIANCE: how accurate can you get?, J. Opt. Soc. Am. A, in press.

for a free download of the non-typeset version go here:
http://josaa.osa.org/upcoming_pdf.cfm?id=63954

In particular we've looked at accuracy for different colour coding variants:
RGB, sRGB and spectral rendering with a strong emphasis on colour accuracy (and
luminance of course). For validation we compared rendering results with
measurements from the real-world counterpart scene.

cheers,

alexa
